summary: A surreal tale of a married couple going on a road trip to visit the wife's parents with the intention of killing them for the inheritance.
cast: Mireille Darc|Jean Yanne|Jean-Pierre Kalfon|Yves Afonso|Yves Beneyton|Juliet Berto|Michèle Breton|Michel Cournot|Lex De Bruijn|Omar Diop|Jean Eustache|Jean-Claude Guilbert|Paul Gégauff|Blandine Jeanson|Louis Jojot|Valérie Lagrange|Jean-Pierre Léaud|Ernest Menzer|Daniel Pommereulle|Isabelle Pons|Helen Scott|Georges Staquet|László Szabó|Virginie Vignon|Anne Wiazemsky
title: Week End
